article_title: Why Two MDs Chose To Study Business

article_metadata.author: David Shaywitz

og.description: Finally, Mongan responded, “Well, doctors don’t know anything about how to run anything. You can’t add. You don’t understand how hospitals make money. You don’t understand how to manage people. You’re just a narcissistic crazy resident. Go away and get an MBA.”
